LightningComponentBundle.description: Custom implementation of lightning-textarea with extra options to support with display a word or character count

property.name: value
property.label: Value
property.description: This is the existing value for input or the current value for output.

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: Provide the label / title for the text area.

property.name: fieldLevelHelp
property.label: Help Text
property.description: The help text that appears in a popover.

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: If present, the textarea field must be filled out before the form can be submitted.

property.name: readOnly
property.label: Read Only
property.description: If present, the textarea field is read-only and cannot be edited.

property.name: disabled
property.label: Disabled
property.description: If present, the textarea field is disabled and users cannot interact with it.

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: The variant changes the appearance of the textarea. Accepted variants include standard, label-hidden, label-inline, and label-stacked. This value defaults to standard. Use label-hidden to hide the label but make it available to assistive technology. Use label-inline to horizontally align the label and textarea. Use label-stacked to place the label above the textarea.

property.name: placeholder
property.label: Placeholder
property.description: Text that is displayed when the field is empty, to prompt the user for a valid entry.

property.name: maxCharacterCountMessage
property.label: Max Character Count Message
property.description: Provide the text to appear should if you have set the Max Character Count and the input value exceeds this. This message is a live message and so is activated only the limit is reached.

property.name: maxWordCountMessage
property.label: Max Word Count Message
property.description: Provide the text to appear should if you have set the Max Word Count and the input value exceeds this. This message is a live message and so is activated only the limit is reached.

property.name: displayCharacterCount
property.label: Display Character Count
property.description: Confirm that you want to apply and display the character count on page

property.name: displayWordCount
property.label: Display Word Count
property.description: Confirm that you want to apply and display the word count on page

property.name: requireFieldMessage
property.label: Required field message
property.description: Provide a message to appear if this field is required and the value has not been provided. This message will display in 2 different places. If the field is required and the user enters the box then moves to another box it will highlight that it is required. If the user navigates to the next page within the flow and the value has not been provided it will appear.

property.name: textAreaHeight
property.label: Input box minimum height
property.description: Define the minimum height of the input box supports px, em or rem sizes but you must include them so 300px/30em/30rem are all valid
